title: Bard T-Pose Bug (Gameplay)
body:
I am playing with elderwood bard and when I laugh it makes bard T pose.
{{champion:432}} (https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/329498888392409089/427669615351693323/unknown.png)

replies.body: Hey! Thanks for the report. Ahhh, this one was caused by some back side file restructures. We've got a fix in that should find its way to live in 8.7. Sorry about that! D:
